attributes.action: We call upon HM Government to promote British goods and services as the priority
attributes.additional_details:
We need to invest in ourselves. You need to seriously consider if you want to buy foreign goods and services over and above our own.

This country consistently imports more goods than it sells. We purchase goods from all around the world while other countries dump their products at below cost prices - Steel from China for example.

The Elephant in the room is Globalisation. We MUST challenge it.

 If we can do one thing to support our own economy it is to buy British!
attributes.background:
The country has chosen to exit the EU and bravely go into a new world. In this world we need to strengthen and maximise the revenue from the products we manufacture and the services we sell not just to the world but also within our own UK market.

If you voted for Leave or Stay - vote for this.

rejection.details: We can only accept petitions which call on the Government or Parliament to take clear, specific action.
